# ACLSimulationTutorial

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This provides a `learnr` tutorial for a simple simulation model of ACL injury and subsequent osteoarthritis incidence and joint replacement surgery.

## Installation

You can install the current version of ACLSimulationTutorial from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("uo-cmor/ACLSimulationTutorial")
```
## Usage

Use `ACLSimulationTutorial::run_tutorial()` to run the included tutorial.
